name: Ace Cash
description: Ace Capital Ventures Limited is the world's 1st Integrated Incubator for Startups providing Venture Capital / Seed Investment using the blockchain technology. Ace Capital Ventures provides a combination of capital, mentoring and network to its investee companies. Ace Capital is present across 200 cities globally including UK, Georgia, India & Thailand. Ace Capital invests in the range of 500,000$ - 100 Million $ per startup through a network of HNIs, Individuals, Financial Influencers, Institutions, Family Offices, CXOs, etc. Ace Capital Ventures has a unique model which allows investors to participate with capital and knowledge to early growth stage startups in return of equity. You never know which idea goes on to become the next big story. Having built a very elite group of retail and HNI investors, we believe we have the access to some of the best opportunities in early stage.
